page.title: 18News in Stamford Bridge
page.content: In the village there is a magazine called the Link. In it there is all the local news and advertising. Local newspapers are: Yorkshire Evening Press, Pocklington Times and the Advertiser.We get Radio York and Radio Humberside.When we had Midsummer Madness,to raise funds for our Sports Centre,they came to interview local people.The Stamford Times is the school newspaper.{News Items-July Summer Fair:The Summer Queen will be crowned at 2.00pm. Money raised will be used to buy a second micro-computer for the school. Youth Club returns after 10 weeks'absence. Lots of teams to join. Come and compete against other youth clubs.Thursdays 7.00-9.30pm. Admission 10p.
